title: lower ranked queue
body: basically I lagged out of two consecutive games while in the champion select screen as my client wasn't up tp date, i then got a low queue priority for 5 games, is this right?

replies.body:
Lower priority queue would only trigger [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) from a history of leaving games.  A [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) during champion select would only last for 1 match, so it sounds like these games are starting without you.  :(  We can work on fixing this up, though!

You may want to stick to custom games for now and run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help make sure your network isn't struggling to transition you from champion select and into the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
